summary: TL*THE CONTACT OWNS A 2003 CHEVROLET TRAILBLAZER.  THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE WINDSHIELD WIPERS WILL DEACTIVATE ONLY WHEN THE VEHICLE IS SHUT OFF.  OCCASIONALLY, WHEN MAKING A LEFT TURN, THE HAZARD LIGHTS WOULD ILLUMINATE.  THE FAILURE BEGAN TWO YEARS AGO, BUT HAS BECOME MORE FREQUENT.  THE SPEED WAS UNKNOWN.  THE CURRENT MILEAGE WAS 75,000 AND FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 53,000.
